meanings.definition: Beefalos (noun): a hybrid animal resulting from the crossbreeding of domestic cattle and American bison.
meanings.sent1: The beefalos grazed peacefully in the meadow.
meanings.sent2: Farmers raise beefalos for their unique qualities.
meanings.sent3: The beefalos decided to have a dance-off with the cows.
meanings.sent4: In the field, the beefalos stood as a symbol of unity between two species.
meanings.sent5: Children love visiting the farm to see the majestic beefalos up close.
